bibl.bibl: Würtenberger, Leopold. 1873. Neuer Beitrag zum geologischen Beweise der Darwin’schen Theorie. Ausland, 4 January 1873, pp. 6–10; 13 January 1878, pp. 25–9.
bibl.idno: DAR Pam R245 annotated (fragile: in conservation lockup, 8 May 2017). Date is not visible on pages. CD has written 7. 8. 73 at the top but since Ausland was published on a Monday and this is not a Monday whichever way you read it, it can't be the issue date. Dates checked in BL (P.P.4755). SE.
